[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=body.txt
actions=end-of-message-temporary-failure

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--action;temporary-failure;--end-of-message-regexp;Fail

[client10027]
port=10027

[end-of-message-temporary-failure]
command=end-of-message
chunk=Fail

response=end-of-message
n_received=2
status=continue
